children.value:
A child of mass 
$\quantity{25}{kg}$
 sits at one end of a see-saw, 
$\quantity{2}{m}$
 away from the pivot.

Where should her 
$\quantity{60}{kg}$
 parent sit in order to balance the see-saw?

If the child tips the see-saw very gently by pushing on the ground with her legs so that she rises by 
$\quantity{0.4}{m}$
, how far will her parent fall on the other side?
How does the potential energy gained by the child compare with the potential energy lost by the parent?
